title: A Truck Full of Money: One Man's Quest (2016) by Tracy Kidder
description:
A Truck Full of Money: One Man's Quest to Recover from Great Success by Tracy Kidder 
Hardcover: 288 pages
Publisher: Random House (September 20, 2016)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0812995244
ISBN-13: 978-0812995244
Format: ePub, Mobi

â€œA perfectly executed, exquisitely reported parable of the Internet age and the wild, mad adventure that is start-up culture.â€â€”Charles Duhigg

Tracy Kidder, the â€œmaster of the nonfiction narrativeâ€ (The Baltimore Sun) and author of the bestselling classic The Soul of a New Machine, now tells the story of Paul English, a kinetic and unconventional inventor and entrepreneur, who as a boy rebelled against authority. Growing up in working-class Boston, English discovers a medium for his talents the first time he sees a computer. As a young man, despite suffering from what would eventually be diagnosed as bipolar disorder, he begins his pilgrimâ€™s journey through the ups and downs in the brave new world of computers. Relating to the Internet as if itâ€™s an extension of his own mind, he discovers that he has a talent for conceiving innovative enterprises and building teams that can develop them, becoming â€œa Pied Piperâ€ of geeks. His innovative management style, success, and innate sense of fair play inspire intense loyalty. Early on, one colleague observes: â€œSomeday this boyâ€™s going to get hit by a truck full of money, and Iâ€™m going to be standing beside him.â€ Yet when English does indeed make a fortune, when the travel website Kayak is sold for almost two billion dollarsâ€”the first thing he thinks about is how to give the money away: â€œWhat else would you do with it?â€ The second thing he thinks is, Whatâ€™s next?

With the power of a consummate storyteller, Tracy Kidder casts a fresh, critical, and often humorous eye on the way new ideas and new money are reshaping our culture and the world. A Truck Full of Money is a mesmerizing portrait of an irresistibly endearing man who is indefatigable, original, and as unpredictable as America itself
